item.title: How can I make it so my Duel frame is only there in Duel Arena
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

if(duelArena()) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(4); outStream.writeByteA(0); outStream.writeString("Duel"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); }
Make a duelArena boolean containing the coordinates of the duel arena.

item.title: How can I make it so my Duel frame is only there in Duel Arena
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

I got this code to create my Duel frame (The option “Duel” on players) :

outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(4); outStream.writeByteA(0); outStream.writeString("Duel"); outStream.endFrameVarSize();

How can I make it so the option “Duel” on players is only there in Duel Arena.

Thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I make it so my Duel frame is only there in Duel Arena
